org.apache.hadoop.ipc

Class RPC.Builder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.ipc.RPC.Builder
  • Enclosing class:
    RPC

    public static class RPC.Builder
extends Object
    Class to construct instances of RPC server with specific options.
